claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
explanation: A multi-panel schematic showing: 1) a service area with nine facilities of various sizes; 2) similar–sized facilities paired and randomized into Block A or Block B; and 3) a table listing weekly alternating administration of SD-IIV4 and RIV4 across four weeks for each facility. The figure depicts cluster randomization of facilities and weekly alternation between SD-IIV4 and RIV4 vaccines but does not mention Flublok or Fluarix by name or indicate a pivotal trial comparing Flublok (quadrivalent) against Fluarix (quadrivalent). Therefore, this does not support the claim. Note: Brand names and pivotal trial context are not shown; interpretation limited to visible labels SD-IIV4 and RIV4.
